data.instruction: Good morning. This is a puzzle game
The goal is compose the name of a Nobel Prize
Using the tokens on the board, you have to compose the world in the first row
During the game I might provide you assistance
Please, move the token only when I say ...... It's your turn
data.LEV_1: "Come on, I know you can do it"
"Take into account the rules of the game"
"Remember you have to compose the name of a nobel prize of 5 letters"
data.LEV_2: "The solution can be one of those:"
data.LEV_3: "That's easy.... the right token to move is.."
data.LEV_4: "The token to move is this one..."
"Take it ... and move in the right location"
data.help: "Do you need help? Say YES or NO"
data.help_timeout: "No worries, I will do something for you"
data.time_out: "Time is passing I will provide you assistance again"
data.compassion: "People say lucky in love unlucky in gaming"
"Dont worry I'm sure you will get better"
"I know how you feel, I've been in this situation before"
data.congratulation: "Well done, you're playing as I expected"
data.end_game: "It has been a pleasure playing with you, hope you've enjoyed too"
